2. Next, we count the number of Justices appointed by Sila María Calderón. This would be Anabelle Rodríguez, Liana Fiol Matta, and Federico Hernández Denton (as they are all in the same row with the "appointed by" column containing the name Sila María Calderón).

3. After that, we count the total number of Justices. To do this, we can simply count all the rows where the "rank" column contains either "associate justice" or "chief justice".

4. Finally, we compare the two counts from steps 2 and 3 to determine whether only 3 of the new justices were appointed by Sila María Calderón.
